context.description: The FTEOutput node serializes the message tree to a file. It then uses the integration server's WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition agent to transfer the file to a remote agent.
Properties navigator This displays the node properties. Configure the node by selecting the properties and setting their values. Mandatory properties are marked with an asterisk.

topic.label: FTEOutput node - Configuring the FTEOutput node

context.description: Basic tab Settings for working with WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition.
Use the FTEInput node to receive files using the WebSphere MQ File Transfer Edition
